room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Riddle Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Great experience! We did the Prison Break room, we did not make it out but we had a great time. Staff were super friendly, helpful, and funny! We will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Riddle Escape Room in Phoenix
review: We tried heist and prison break. Both rooms were well thought out and very high quality. The staff was friendly and encouraging. We will definitely be back to try the remaining rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Riddle Escape Room in Phoenix
review: We love riddle escape room! The owners are the nicest. The rooms are high tech and challenging. The prison break room is great.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Riddle Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Great imagination has put this challenging room as one of the best in Arizona! Prison Break has puzzles and games never seen in an escape room before. Real jail bars, toilets and good decor make this room worth it. You and your friends will need to focus and work together to escape before time runs out. High difficulty but Tons of fun!
